4. Brian Livingston, Place 6

Brian Livingston, Council Member Place 6
========================================

**Elected to Frisco City Council:** 2017  
**Current Term Expires:** 2026  
**Occupation:** Commercial Banker  
**Family:** Married to Brittany, two daughters

### Education

Master of Business Administration, University of Texas at Dallas

Master of Science - Accounting, University of Texas at Dallas

Bachelor of Business Administration - Finance, University of Texas at Austin

### City of Frisco Service

Vice Chairman- Frisco Board of Adjustment/Construction Board of Appeals

Board Member- Frisco Convention & Visitors Bureau (Visit Frisco)

### Other Service

Watch D.O.G.S at Carroll Elementary

DFW Executive Committee, Pancreatic Cancer Action Network

### Contact Us
